revised_title: Discovery of Ground-Terms in the Spectrum of Nickel II and Proposed Standard Wave-Lengths in the Schumann Region
tldr: The authors investigated the spectrum of nickel II and discovered the ground-terms using a vacuum spectrograph. They found that the lines involving the ground-terms of the spark spectrum come on particularly strongly and are very long. The study allowed them to propose standard wave-lengths in the Schumann region, which can be used as a reference for future research.
